title: Groundhog Day, Stacey Abrams, Nobel Peace Prize, Pence and more.
itunes:title: Groundhog Day, Stacey Abrams, Nobel Peace Prize, Pence and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! This is the show with the most ignurosity and it is undeniable. The Chief Love Officer helps a divorced lady refocus her life. Kanye West is being sued by members of the Sunday Service cast and crew. Former Georgia gubernatorial Democratic candidate Stacey Abrams has been nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize. Punxsutawney Phil predicts another six more weeks of winter. Uncle Steve will be hosting the NFL Honors for the third consecutive year. Former Vice President Mike Pence went from Air Force 2 to coach. The CLO returns to give us some ideas for Valentine's Day on a budget. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about losing a friend and reminds us to be thankful for everyday that we wake up.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
